Package echo.evs.web

Class VotingBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • echo.evs.web.VotingBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    @ViewScoped
@Named
public class VotingBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents actions done when participant is voting
    See Also:

      • getToken

        public java.lang.String getToken()
        Get token string that is used
        Returns:
        token

      • setToken

        public void setToken​(java.lang.String token)
        Set token sting that is used. Loads poll based on the token
        Parameters:
        token - token string

      • isTokenSet

        public boolean isTokenSet()
        Check if a token is set.
        Returns:
        true if token is set

      • getPollByToken

        public void getPollByToken()
        Loads a poll based by the token that is set. Also checks if the poll is in state voting and if not sets the failure messages accordingly.

      • getPoll

        public echo.evs.dto.Poll getPoll()
        Get poll that is loaded
        Returns:
        poll

      • setPoll

        public void setPoll​(echo.evs.dto.Poll poll)
        Set poll that is loaded
        Parameters:
        poll - poll

      • isSuccess

        public boolean isSuccess()
        Returns:
        true if the poll could be stored successfully

      • isFailure

        public boolean isFailure()
        Returns:
        true if the poll could not be stored

      • getFailureMessage

        public java.lang.String getFailureMessage()
        Get the failure message that is shown when failure is true
        Returns:
        failure message

      • checkChoices

        public void checkChoices​(echo.evs.dto.Question question,
                         echo.evs.dto.Item item)
        Not used anymore. Get max choices of a question
        Parameters:
        question - question
        item - item

      • isVotesValid

        public boolean isVotesValid()
        Check if all votes are valid. Checks for single and yes/no question if one item is marked or user absent from this question Checks for multiple choice question if user entered the correct number of votes or absent from this question
        Returns:
        true if valid

      • submitVote

        public void submitVote()
        Submits the vote entered by the user if votes are valid. This action will invalidate the token once votes are stored
